alert.note: Alert for Le Flore; Sequoyah (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 15 at 9:27PM CDT until May 15 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SEQUOYAH AND NORTHEASTERN LE FLORE COUNTIES... At 927 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles west of Gans to 2 miles south of Spiro, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Sallisaw... Poteau... Spiro... Panama... Gans... Cameron... Shady Point... Cowlington... Scullyville... This includes Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 304 and 305. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
